flawed_nl_solution:
He contacted 1-0.4=<<1-0.4=0.06>>0.06 of his friends
So he contacted 100*0.06=<<100*0.06=6>>6 people
So he removes 6/2=<<6/2=3>>3 people
So he has 100-3=<<100-3=97>>97 friends left
#### 97

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.6, not 0.06. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
